name: MikroTik | RouterOS | Security | Authentication | Login (SYSLOG)
description: account user mitya logged in from 193.34.20.2 via ssh

patterns.value_re: account user (?P<user>.+?) logged in from (?P<ip>\S+) via (ssh|telnet|winbox|ftp|api)$

name: MikroTik | RouterOS | Security | Authentication | Logout (SYSLOG)
description: account user mitya logged in from 193.34.20.2 via ssh

patterns.value_re: account user (?P<user>.+?) logged out from (?P<ip>\S+) via (ssh|telnet|winbox|ftp|api)$

name: MikroTik | RouterOS | Security | Authentication | Login Failed (SYSLOG)
description: critical login failure for user root from 217.119.114.126 via ssh

patterns.value_re: critical login failure for user (?P<user>.+?) from (?P<ip>\S+) via (ssh|telnet|winbox|ftp|api)
